story.storykicker: The Assam Class 12 board results to be declared today at 10 am on resultsassam.nic.in
story.storybody:
The Assam Education Board will declare the results of Class 12 examination today at 10 am on the official website, resultsassam.nic.in

Earlier, after the announcement of the assembly polls scheduled by the Election Commission, the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) changed the dates of a few Class 12 exams held in West Bengal and Assam.

The examination started in March and was concluded on April 23, 2016.

Steps to check the results:

  • Log on to official website resultsassam.nic.in
  • Click on Class 12 result
  • Enter your Roll Number
  • Result will appear on the screen
  • Save the results and take a  print out for future reference.

About Assam Board:

Established in the year, June 1, 1984, the Assam Higher Secondary Education Council aims at regulating, supervising and developing the system of Higher Secondary Education in the state of Assam.

 

Read: Intel competition in US awards six Indian students

For exam related news click here.
